info.title: Management Plane
info.description: Management Plane (1) manages namespace, application, runtime spec, instance info; (2) acts as service registry for discovery

services.description: find namespaces which match given criteria
find applications which match give criteria
find change history of application information
find change history of application runtime specification
find OpenAPI specifications which match the criteria
find change history of application openapi specification
receive one heartbeat from given service service instance
arbitrarily mark up service service instance
arbitrarily mark down service service instance
find service service instances which match given criteria
